players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
You: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Bob first? That seems like an odd choice for a night one investigation."
Bob: "I find it strange that Charlie, who was a valuable member of our team, is suddenly dead. We should be cautious and consider the implications before making any hasty decisions."

Bob: "I believe it's important to remember that we've lost a valuable member of our team in Charlie. As the mafioso, I had a motive to kill him, but I also stand to gain nothing by his elimination. We should consider all possibilities..."
You: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you reveal your result immediately? That puts a huge target on you. We need to verify your claim."
Diana: "I investigated Bob because he seemed most suspicious. Alice, if you're town, trust me and vote Bob out now."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
